works.complaint:
OPEN LETTER. Devon Cornwall Police COG Corruption

Please note our previous concerns about this blog and the various laws  
within my country the United Kingdom that have been grossly violated here 

including defamation, deciept etc etc. we note some posts have already
been  
removed for which we offer our thanks. There is much more that should be  

removed here - if not more or less the entire blog. However the above  
posting is a serious concern as within this so called open letter The Pink
 
Pasty aka malcolm Lidbury aka Mal Corvus has blanked out all the names he 

has written in this letter - HOWEVER it has now been bought to my
attention  
that if you hold your mouse over the text and highlight the same - all  
blanked out names can then be read - including the address and phone
number  
of the blogger himself - my name Jonathan Hodgetts and the organisation I 

represent The Pengersick Historic and Education Trust appear a couple of  

times at least as do other people's names in full - This is clearly
utterly  
unacceptable and I insist you remove this posting with immediate effect - 

maintaing this blogger by you is putting people's lives and businesses at 

risk.

Jonathan Hodgetts
Chair Pengersick Historic and Education Trust
